TextView.android:text: Please read the questions carefully. Be aware of your current health and provide correct information only.
Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms?
Have you worked together or stayed in the same close environment of a confirmed COVID-19 case?
Living in the same house, room, apartment, dorm unit
History of dining together within the last 2 days from date of exposure
Are you recently diagnosed as a confirmed case of COVID-19 in the last 2 weeks?
Have you travelled outside the Philippines in the last 14 days?

EditText.android:hint: Date of Arrival to the Philippines

TextView.android:text: I hereby authorize University of Santo Tomas, to collect and process the data indicated herein for the purpose of effecting control of the COVID-19 infection. I understand that my personal information is protected by RA 10173, Data Privacy Act of 2012, and that I am required by RA 11469, Bayanihan to Heal as One Act, to provide truthful information.
